other_tests.procedure_name: CT-guided placement of an ___ pigtail catheter
other_tests.findings: Placement of a catheter into right lower quadrant fluid collection.

other_tests.procedure_name: Multidetector CT of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Large fluid collection within the right hemipelvis measuring approximately 4.2 x 6.8 x 5.1 cm, with surrounding fat stranding and adjacent bowel wall thickening along the cecum and portions of the ascending colon. Likely perforated appendix indicated.
